properties.name: livecontext.assetService.changeEvents.maximumSize
properties.description: Maximum number of asset related content change events that are hold in-memory to follow asset changes.

properties.name: livecontext.assetService.changeEvents.expireAfterWriteInSeconds
properties.description: That is the time that a Solr index can lag behind without there being a gap for the AssetService.

properties.name: livecontext.assetService.searchCacheDurationInSeconds
properties.description: The time in seconds a asset Solr query is cached in-memory in a cache key.

properties.name: livecontext.assetService.resultLimit
properties.description: The maximum possibly found assets per query. If set to a low value it can happen that some assets are not found.
